generate_pin.title: AIS Wear OS
generate_pin.description:
Generates a secret PIN code. Note this code will be valid only for 2 minutes.

 ###### ![AIS Wear OS PIN](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_wear_os/pin_3.png)

enter_pin.title: AIS Wear OS

init.title: AIS Wear OS
init.description:
Install the AIS home app on your Wear OS watch.

 Then, in the app on the watch, select the pairing option with a PIN code [Details in the documentation ](https://www.ai-speaker.com).
 ###### ![AIS Wear OS PIN](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_wear_os/pin_1.png)
Please proceed to generate the pairing code.

confirm.description:
![AIS logo](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_wear_os/logo.png)

Do you want to add access to AIS from the app on your watch?
confirm.title: AIS Wear OS

abort.go_to_device:
OK, Congratulations! If you entered the PIN correctly on the device, your new Wear OS device should appear on the gateway in a moment.
###### ![AIS Wear OS PIN](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_wear_os/thumb-up.png)
abort.pin_error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
